subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: High School football standout Joe Martinek, who at 17 is the closest thing to a local celebrity in Hopatcong, N.J., decided to stay local and join a burgeoning program at Rutgers.
snippet: High School football standout Joe Martinek, who at 17 is the closest thing to a local celebrity in Hopatcong, N.J., decided to stay local and join a burgeoning program at Rutgers.
